name: Finding Princess Fish!
description:
A short Platformer for a 3 Hour Long GameJam  (I got 3 minutes left)

The Restriction was the Assetpack - I only used the Art out of the pack.

Controlls:

A & D  to move left and right, 

Space to Jump

Left Top -> Volume Slider!

You can jump on enemy to defeat them. But don't run into them!

If you want to RESTART just reload the Page - there is a AudioManager Issiu!
